choices.name: Get started with Italian research.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research records. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Basics: Learn the basics of researching Italian ancestors.

    ☆ AC—Beginning Italian Family Research—31:00 - 2013


    ☆ FS—Italian Research (3 pgs.) - 2009

  2. Get an overview of Italian genealogy in this article and video.

    ☆ Introduction to Italian Genealogy - 2015
    ☆ AAC—Finding Your Italian Roots—Video Series

  3. Discover your Italian-American heritage in this FamilySearch blog article.

    ☆ FS—3 Simple Ways to Discover Your Italian Heritage - 2016

  4. Start your search for Italian ancestors.

    ☆ AC—Starting Your Search For Italian Ancestors - 2011
    ☆ GTV—Get Started with Your Italian Family History Research—22:20 - 2018



  5. Record Finder: Use the Italy Record Finder to understand record types for research.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Record Finder

  6. Explore a variety of records on the FreeItalianAncestry site.
Tips
  1. Read the Italy Research Guide for ancestor research tips.

    ☆ FS—Italy Research Guide - 2018

  2. Get some basic tips for Italian genealogy in these Ancestry videos.

    ☆ AC—Top Tips for Beginning Italian Family Research—31:24 - 2013



    ☆ AAC—Tips and Strategies—7:00

  3. Town of Origin: Learn how to find the town of origin for an Italian ancestor.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Finding Place of Origin
    ☆ The Town of Origin

  4. Watch these videos to learn more about town of origin strategies.

    ☆ AAC—Locating U.S. Records of Ancestors: Finding Place of Origin—10:36
    ☆ AAC—Italian Jurisdictions and Strategies for Town of Origin—5:12

choices.name: Learn about Italian language resources.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for language resources. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Words: Learn the Italian words you need for genealogy.

    ☆ FS—Italian Genealogical Word List
    ☆ Italian-English Translation of Genealogical Terms

  2. Latin: Learn Latin words for earlier research in these articles.

    ☆ TH—Latin Genealogy Word List - 2019
    ☆ FS—Wiki: Latin Genealogy Word List

Records and Handwriting
  1. Get tips for finding Italian records.

    ☆ AC—Researching Italian Records
    ☆ LT—Tracing Ancestry Through Medieval Italian Records

  2. Examples: See examples of how to read Italian records.

    ☆ AC—Reading Italian Records

  3. Handwriting Skills: Watch this video for tips on reading Italian handwriting.

    ☆ AAC—Reading the Handwriting—6:39

  4. Learn Italian paleography in this BYU Script Tutorial.

choices.name: Explore resources for Italian research.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research resources. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.

content.text:
1. Explore Italian record resources in this blog.

    ☆ FS—21st Century Italian Genealogy - 2015

  2. Sites: Explore ☆Your Guide to Finding Italian Ancestors by Barb Snow.

  3. Explore the ☆Forebears.io site for research records.
  4. Explore the ☆ItalianGen site.
  5. Correspondence: Learn how to request records from Italy.

    ☆ Requesting Records from Italy - 2019
    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Letter Writing Guide

  6. Trips: Get tips for planning a research trip to Italy.

    ☆ Planning an Italian Research Trip - 2019

choices.name: Learn about surnames for Italian research.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for research resources. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Surname Maps: See maps that show surname distribution across Italy.

    ☆ Maps of 1200 Italian Surnames—10:01 - 2018


    ☆ Italian Surnames Map

  2. Surnames: Learn about Italian surname origins in these articles.

    ☆ TH—Italian Surnames and Origins - 2018
    ☆ FS—Italy Names

  3. Explore a list of Italian surnames on the ☆Surname in Italy site.
  4. Search the ☆Geneanet site for Italian surnames.
  5. Search for Italian surnames in a number of databases.

name: Civil Registration
section_name: Learn about Italy civil registration and vital records.

choices.name: Learn about Italy civil registration records.

content.text:
1. Learn about Italy civil registration records in these articles.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Civil Registration
    ☆ Italian Civil Registration

  2. Antenati: Learn how to use the Portale Antenati to search for civil registration records.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in the Portale Antenati - 2018
    ☆ Finding Your Italian Ancestors Online—23:41 - 2018



  3. Finding Records: Learn about finding civil registration records for births.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in Italian Civil Records (Part 2) - 2018
    ☆ Finding Your Family in Italian Civil Records (Part 3) - 2018

  4. Read this guide for finding civil registration records online.

    ☆ FS—Civil Registration Records Online - 2020

  5. Marriages: Learn about finding civil registration records for marriages.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in Italian Civil Marriage Records (Part 5) - 2019
    ☆ Finding Your Family in Italian Civil Marriage Records (Part 6) - 2019

  6. Learn about research clues from matrimonial packets.

    ☆ LT—Hidden Italian Treasure – Processetti and Allegati Matrimonial Packets
    ☆ PR—Italian Allegati: Fast Lane to the Past

  7. Errors in Records: Learn how to recognize and resolve errors made by town clerks.

    ☆ How to Overcome a Town Clerk's Errors - 2022

choices.name: Explore additional civil registration resources.

content.text:
1. U.S. Birth Records: Find your Italian ancestors in U.S. birth records.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Birth Records - 2018

  2. U.S. Marriage Records: Find your Italian ancestors in U.S. marriage records.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Marriage Records - 2018
    ☆ How to Read an Italian Marriage Record - 2017

  3. U.S. Death Records: Find your Italian ancestors in U.S. death records.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Death Records - 2018
    ☆ How to Read an Italian Death Record - 2017

  4. U.S. Census Records: Find your Italian ancestors in U.S. census records.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Census Records - 2018

  5. Italian Census Records: Learn more about Italian census records for research.

    ☆ Italian Censuses
  6. Vital Records: Explore Italian vital records for selected towns.

name: Church and Cemetery Records
section_name: Learn about Italian church and cemetery records.

choices.name: Learn about Italy church records.

content.text:
1. Overview: Learn about Italy church records in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Church Records

  2. Watch this video to learn about ecclesiastical records in Italy.

    ☆ AAC—Italian Ecclesiastical Records—6:01

  3. Parish: Learn how to use Italian parish records in your research.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in Italian Parish Records - 2019
    ☆ RT—Italian Catholic Parish Research—27:46 - 2021



  4. Learn about information kept in parish family books in Italy.

    ☆ "Status animarum" or Parish Family Books

  5. U.S. Church Records: Learn how to use U.S. church records in your Italian research.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Church Records - 2018

  6. Explore Italian parish records in the Surnames in Italy site.
  7. Jewish: Explore the ☆Jewish Genealogy Encyclopedia for Jewish resources in Italy.

QUIKLinks

choices.name: Explore Italy cemetery records.

content.text:
1. Learn about finding cemetery information in your ancestral town.

    ☆ Finding Relatives in Your Ancestral Hometown's Cemetery - 2018

  2. Learn about information that can be found in funeral cards in Italy.

    ☆ This Memento Provides Key Facts for Your Family Tree - 2019

  3. Explore online cemetery records in the ☆SurnamesInItaly site.
  4. Search the ☆Find A Grave site for cemetery records.
  5. Search the ☆BillionGraves site for cemetery records.

name: Emigration and Immigration
section_name: Learn about Italy emigration and immigration.

choices.name: Learn about Italy emigration and immigration.

hidden.content:
• * Good: Using the articles and videos in this Choice, write down key learnings for immigration records. Then use the learnings for searches for an ancestor.
  • * Proficient: Same as above, for two or more ancestors.

content.text:
1. Basics: Learn about Italy emigration and immigration in these articles.

    ☆ Immigration Records
    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Emigration and Immigration

  2. Wikipedia: Learn about immigration history and demographics in this Wikipedia article.

    ☆ Wikipedia: Italian Americans

  3. Learn about the Italian diaspora (spread of emigrants) in this video.

    ☆ AAC—Italian Diaspora—8:58

  4. Overview: Here's an overview of Italian emigration history and records. See more information in the links on the right side of the linked page.

    ☆ European Emigration: Italy

  5. U.S. Records: Find your Italian ancestors in U.S. immigration records.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Immigration Records - 2017

  6. Sites: Explore the Immigrant Ancestors site from Brigham Young University.
  7. Explore additional websites for emigration and immigration.
Passenger Lists
  1. Ship Manifests: Find your Italian ancestors in ship manifests.

    ☆ Finding Your Family Surname in a Ship Manifest - 2017

  2. Passenger Lists: Explore ship passenger lists on the Olive Tree Genealogy site.
  3. Learn about annotations in passenger list records.

    ☆ Secrets in Passenger Lists: Post Immigration Annotations - 2019
    ☆ Secrets in Passenger Lists: Contemporaneous Annotations - 2019

  4. Immigrant Ships: Explore the ☆Immigrant Ship site. Select a Volume, then choose Italy as the departure or arrival location.
  5. Watch this video case study of passenger list records.

    ☆ AAC—Case Study: Sellecca Family—6:03

QUIKLinks

content.text:
1. FamilySearch: Learn about Italy Military Records in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Military Records

  2. Records: Learn how to find military records for Italian ancestors.

    ☆ Finding Your Ancestor's Italian Military Record - 2019
    ☆ Finding Your Family in U.S. Military Records - 2018

  3. Recruitment: Learn about Italian lists of military recruitment.

    ☆ Lists of Military Recruitment

  4. Sites: Explore additional websites for military records.
  5. Find links to sites with World War military records for Italy.
  6. Learn about Italian military cemeteries in Germany, Austria, and Poland.

choices.name: Explore Italian newspapers for ancestor research.

content.text:
1. Learn about using Italian newspapers for research.

    ☆ Finding Your Family in Newspapers - 2018

  2. Find links to ☆Italian newspapers on the Wikipedia site.
  3. Search Italian newspapers in the ☆onlinenewspapers.com site.
  4. Search Italian newspapers in the ☆world-newspapers.com site.
  5. Search Italian newspapers in the ☆ABYZ News Links site.

choices.name: There are a number of websites with valuable resources for Italian research.

content.text:
1. Explore links in the FamilySearch Wiki.
  2. Explore links in ☆Cyndi's List.
  3. Explore links in ☆Genealogylinks.net.

choices.name: Use QUIKLinks, Partners, and GenealogyInTime to quickly search the most common record collections for Italy.

content.text:
1. QUIKLinks are indicated by lightning-bolt icons in the Goals above.They point to collections with 50,000 or more records. When you click a QUIKLink icon, scroll down on the resulting page to see the QUIKLinks.
  2. In the Partners section (near the top of the page), explore additional record collections in FamilySearch, Ancestry, Findmypast and MyHeritage.
  3. Explore the FamilySearch page for Italian online record collections.
  4. Explore the Europe page of the GenealogyInTime website. Record collections are listed and described in order from newest to oldest additions, including FamilySearch, Ancestry, and many other sources.

name: Get Help
section_name: Get help with your Italy research.

choices.name: Use Facebook pages to get answers to your questions.

content.text:
1. Visit the ☆Italy Gen page on Facebook.
  2. Visit the ☆Italian Genealogy page on Facebook.
  3. Visit the ☆Italian Heraldry and Genealogy page on Facebook.
  4. Visit the ☆Southern Europe Genealogy Research Community on Facebook.
  5. See the Genealogy on Facebook list of Facebook groups dedicated to helping with research for Italy.

choices.name: Join a mailing list or message board for Italy research.

content.text:
1. Explore the Italy research mailing lists on Cyndi's List.
  2. Explore the ☆FamilySearch community for help with Italian research.
  3. Use the ☆Ancestry message boards to read or post questions about Italy research.
  4. Explore Italy research questions in the ☆Genealogy Stack Exchange.

choices.name: Learn about Italy genealogy societies.

content.text:
1. Learn about Italy genealogy societies in this FamilySearch Wiki article.

    ☆ FS—Wiki: Italy Societies

  2. Explore Italy genealogy society sites on Cyndi's List.
  3. Get help at a family history center in Italy.
